name: Fear Within
description:
Feel The Fear

Fear Within  is a VR Escape Room Adventure inside the  dark locations filled with horror atmophere. Each room has a different experience, from classic escape room puzzles to action puzzles.

Immerse yourself into a dark story full of mysteries and mind blowing  puzzles. Solve puzzles and escape various locations filled with noir atmosphere.

Reveal the full story and face the souls and sins of greatest horror writers. Be a part of the most exiting novels and plots.

Survive through 8 different escape rooms connected with one story and beware as the darkness itself is looking at you.

Early Access includes one full room to escape - 1 hour of gameplay. Buy now and recieve full release for free.

Save 10 USD and buy now.

Full 360 VR

The levels are designed with 360 degrees in mind, the player is able to move, turn and interact with objects anyway he wants.

Notes

Medium size room is recommended.
Ideally 2.5x2.5 metres

- Oculus Quest Support;

The version in this page is only compatible with the Oculus Quest.
Sideload through ADB or SideQuest.

Instructions on how to use SideQuest here

https://www.androidcentral.com/how-sideload-apps-oculus-quest

https://github.com/the-expanse/SideQuest/wiki/SideQuest-Setup-&-How-To-install
